ComicInfo.Title: If I had a Hammer...
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Elementals start unpacking in their new location, Philadelphia. Which happens to also be the place suffering from a massive vampire problem (part of the reason they were invited to take up residence in the city). The Elementals end up working with the local Police force to corral the vampires into a huge trap. This is successful and they proceed to find the lair of the vampires to exteminate them all. They manage to get rid of all they can, but still no sign of the major vampire, Captain Cadaver. However Captain Cadaver does find Porter Scott who has wandered away from everyone else, and the vampire villain greets him with a quick bite to the neck!
In other places, the government calls Thor for help, since he resides on the moon, he is one of the few who can gather information on the mysterious planet which has suddenly appeared. Morningstar is still spending her Honeymoon in Avalaon, and bumps into Iggy...who was (unbeknownst to her) hired to kill the Elementals quite some time ago.
